sentences.sentence: This will install the HASP device driver setup program.
sentences.translation: 这将安装HASP 的设备驱动程序的安装程序。

sentences.sentence: HASP SRM gives you the ability to quickly respond to changing market needs.
sentences.translation: HASP SRM提供给您快速响应市场需求改变的能力。

sentences.sentence: HASP SRM means engineers don't need to create a new build for every new business model.
sentences.translation: HASP SRM意味着工程师不必要为每一个新的业务模式创建一个新的版本。
